summary:
Adds 20+ pies and an NPC to Skyrim
My first mod
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple mod that just adds 20+ 
types of pies to Skyrim. I didn\'t like the 
fact that there was only one type of pie. This
Mod also adds an NPC that has one of every
kind of pie on him and fifteen of a special
pie. I have also added a unique pie that has
really good effects on it that is placed on
a stone throne in a random place in a random
wilderness map. I don\'t even know where it is
but it is close to a path behind a rock. The
new pies should also be added to merchants
but I\'m not quite sure if I did it right concidering
this is my first mod.
author: KadoDragon
